Buy Bitcoin with Credit or Debit Card in the United States

by Jordan Tuwiner

A few years ago it was impossible to buy bitcoin with a credit or debit card. Today, a number of companies accept credit card payments for bitcoin. While it is possible to buy bitcoin with a credit or debit card, the fees are usually higher due to the higher risk of fraud and higher processing fees.

Circle Buy Bitcoin

Circle lets you buy bitcoin with a debit card instantly with no fee. If you use a credit card you'll have to pay a 3% fee, and wait a few days to receive your coins. Limited to $300 worth of bitcoin per week.

Buy Bitcoin

Changetip Buy Bitcoin

Changetip lets you buy up to $25 worth of bitcoin with a Visa or Mastercard credit/debit card. You'll need to connect a Facebook, Twitter, Reddit or GitHub account. It may take up to 24 hours to get your bitcoin with your first purchase.

Buy Bitcoin

CEX.io Buy Bitcoin

CEX.io lets you buy bitcoin with a credit card, and your bitcoin will be available immediately. CEX.io works in the United States, Europe, and some countries in South America.

Buy Bitcoin

Purse.io Buy Bitcoin

With Purse.io you buy bitcoin with a credit card but not directly. Purse.io connects you with a buyer who wants to make a purchase on Amazon. You use your credit card or debit card to order items from the buyer's Amazon wish list. When the items have been delivered to the buyer, you are given bitcoin equivalent to the value of the items you ordered for the buyer.

Buy Bitcoin

Trucoin Buy Bitcoin

Trucoin lets you buy bitcoin with a Visa or Mastercard credit card in 30 U.S. states. Your bitcoin will be delivered instantly. Available in Alabama, Arizona, Arkansas, American Samoa, Connecticut, Washington D.C., Florida, Georgia, Idaho, Kansas, Kentucky, Maine, Massachusetts, Michigan, Minnesota, Mississippi, Montana, Nebraska, New Jersey, New Mexico, North Dakota, Oregon, Rhode Island, South Carolina, South Dakota, Texas, Wake Island, West Virginia, and Wyoming.

Buy Bitcoin

If you can, try to stay away from buying bitcoin with a credit card. The fees are usually higher, and the wait times longer. Alternate payment methods include bank transfer or cash deposit.
